# -*- mode: CMAKE; -*-

project(s2-geometry C CXX)

set(FAIL_ON_WARNINGS OFF CACHE BOOL "do not enable -Werror")

set(ARANGO_S2GEOMETRY_VERSION "552f562")

set(CMAKE_USE_LIBSSH2 OFF CACHE type BOOL)
set(CMAKE_USE_OPENSSL ON CACHE type BOOL)

set(WITH_GLOG OFF CACHE type BOOL)
set(WITH_GFLAGS OFF CACHE type BOOL)
unset(GTEST_ROOT)

set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE type BOOL)
set(BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE type BOOL)
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${ARANGO_S2GEOMETRY_VERSION})

# result
list(APPEND LINK_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/s2geometry/${ARANGO_S2GEOMETRY_VERSION}")
